## When MRS =$\frac{p_x}{p_y}$ 
$U=2x+3y$ s.t. $4x+6y =48$
- any bundle on the budget line including the corner bundles of $(\frac{M}{p_x},0)$ and $(0,\frac{M}{p_y})$  are optimal bundle. 
--- 
## When MRS $\neq \frac{p_X}{p_y}$
## $U= 2x+3y$ s.t. $3x+4y=48$
|Extreme bundles | substituting in Utility function| Utils|optimality |
|---|---|---|---|
|$(\frac{M}{p_x},0)$=$(16,0)$|$U= 2(16)+3(0)$|32 utils|not optimal|
|$(0,\frac{M}{p_y})$=$(0,12)$|$U= 2(0)+3(12)$|36 utils|optimal|
